title: Community Manager
content:
We are a team. We are accountable. We partner with our clients to deliver strategic creative we are proud of.
We learn together, we create together, we win together.
And most importantly we have fun together.
 
The Role
Ogilvy Australia is looking for a Community Manager who specialises in community engagement. We are looking for someone who has a passion for their craft, gets excited by ideas and is immersed in the craft of social media.
 
Key Responsibilities

Successfully manage client social channels, build and continue to grow brand awareness on social media, monitor and track in real-time any trending moments on social, real-time crisis management.
Gain a thorough understanding of the agency processes, end-to end; and proactively provides input to account, creative and strategy team members regarding community management and social media.
Collaborate with copywriters & social strategists to produce social copy and deliverables.
Work with Account Management team to ensure deliverables remain on-brand and within client guidelines.
Maintain TOV that remains on-brand and in-line strategically with client requests.
Conduct social listening and prepare Daily/Monthly reports, as well as Brand reports as needed
Some ad hoc hours may be required on the weekend to assist other team members when needed

 
Required skills and experience

Some prior experience within communications or community management
Excellent communication and teamwork skills
Strong organisational skills and attention to detail
Having some Photoshop, Editing and Motion Design skills isn't critical, but a big bonus

 
"When people are having fun, they produce better work” – David Ogilvy, Founder.
Please note: All applicants must have valid Australian working rights.
Ogilvy Australia is an equal opportunity employer and is committed to building a diverse and inclusive workplace. We encourage Aboriginal, Torres Strait Islander, and people of all backgrounds to apply.
 At Ogilvy, our people are at the heart of what we do: a creative agency that sparks game-changing ideas across culture and business through collaboration, integrity, and a celebration of self-expression. 
We believe in building powerful teams with purpose. This means hiring and nurturing talent across all races, ethnicities, religions, abilities, sexual orientation, and gender identities – and we relentlessly curate transformative initiatives that make our commitment to fairness, and equity a reality. 
Our ultimate mission is to leave a positive impact on the world, creating a better future for all, while supporting and uplifting the global communities we serve.  This is central to our mantra of Borderless Creativity.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.
